Parser
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Parser.Utils
public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the useful utilities of this package. Used to set the dialog boxes in the middle point of the monitor and to show the message windows to the user.

getMiddle

public static java.awt.Point getMiddle(java.awt.Dimension d)
Used to set a component in the middle of the monitor.

Parameters:
d - dimension of a component which has to be fixed in the middle of the monitor
Returns:
Point point where the required component has to be placed in order to fix it in the middle of the monitor.
